name: Mushroom Clouds
description:
This is just a prototype, not a full game.

MushroomClouds is a single-player, race adventure game with the opportunity to explore the map after finishing it first.

Collect the mushrooms to keep your Soul-Meter up and deliver them to the basket.

Unity Version: 2020.3.1f1 (LTS)

Controls:

 W A S D = movement

Space bar = jump

E = interact (works only with the save-point tree)

Shift = sprint

Game made by:

L4G , M1K4 , Hussam Yasar Raja and Jana Scheibner

This game was created by students of the Game Design section at the 
University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by Prof. Csongor Baranyai Summer Semester 21
